statements: SELECT * FROM StudentPoints;
SELECT student_id, points, badges FROM StudentPoints;
SELECT student_id, points FROM StudentPoints WHERE points > 50;
SELECT badges, student_id, points FROM StudentPoints ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPoints WHERE points > 100 AND badges < 5;
SELECT * FROM StudentPoints WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, points FROM StudentPoints WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM StudentPoints GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_points > 100;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, AVG(points) AS average_points FROM StudentPoints WHERE badges > 0;
SELECT * FROM StudentPoints WHERE student_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY points ASC, badges DESC;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT student_id, points FROM points WHERE points > 50;
SELECT date_earned, points FROM points ORDER BY date_earned DESC;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name FROM badges WHERE date_earned > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM badges WHERE badge_name LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT * FROM points WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY date_earned DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT badge_name, COUNT(badge_id) AS badge_count FROM badges GROUP BY badge_name;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points JOIN badges ON points.student_id = badges.student_id GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date_earned) = 5 AND points > 50 ORDER BY points DESC, date_earned ASC;
SELECT * FROM points ORDER BY date_earned DESC;
SELECT student_name, points FROM students JOIN points ON students.student_id = points.student_id WHERE points.points > 100;
SELECT badge_name, description FROM badges WHERE date_earned BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' AND class_id = 10;
SELECT MAX(points) AS highest_points FROM points;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT student_id, points FROM points WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY date_earned DESC;
SELECT badge_name, description FROM badges WHERE student_id = 1001 AND date_earned >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 2002;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT student_id, total_points FROM points WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT badge_id, badge_name FROM badges ORDER BY badge_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, badge_id FROM student_badges WHERE badge_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM points WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT badge_name, badge_description FROM badges WHERE LENGTH(badge_description) > 20;
SELECT student_id, badge_id FROM student_badges WHERE badge_id = 3 AND student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM points WHERE total_points < 50);
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;

SELECT p.student_id, pb.badge_id, b.badge_name FROM points p JOIN student_badges pb ON p.student_id = pb.student_id JOIN badges b ON pb.badge_id = b.badge_id WHERE p.total_points > 80 AND pb.badge_id < 5 ORDER BY p.student_id ASC, pb.badge_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_badges;
SELECT student_id, badge_id, earned_date FROM student_badges WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT badge_name FROM badges WHERE badge_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, rank FROM leaderboard ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT student_id, level, progress_percentage FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT student_id, total_points FROM points ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM badges WHERE badge_name LIKE '%achievement%';
SELECT student_id, badge_name FROM student_badges JOIN badges ON student_badges.badge_id = badges.badge_id;
SELECT student_id, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE rank <= 10;
